title: Playboy Prince
description: My playboy boss wants me to slip into a new position:Fake fiancée.After years mowing through all the eligible women in New York, Liam earned the nickname Playboy Prince. Now, the tech executive needs to clean up his reputation.He can have any women in the city.And he wants me.His purple-haired, smart mouthed assistant.Six months as his fake fiancée in exchange for the cash to fund my start-up.How can I say no?Too bad Liam is the most frustrating man on the planet. Demanding. Rebellious. Extremely charming.Plus the deep blue eyes. The devil-may-care-smile. The tattoos he hides under his suit.Pretty soon, our kisses don't feel fake.Pretty soon, we don't stop at kissing.Pretty soon, I do the one thing I shouldn't:I fall in love with him.
author: Crystal Kaswell
